text: "Open" is a song by the American heavy metal band Queensrÿche. It was released as a single in support of their 2003 album Tribe. This song was featured on the PC port of the 2003 Video Game, True Crime: Streets of LA. == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2003) !Peak position |- | U.S. Billboard Mainstream Rock | style="text-align:center;"|38 |- |} == References == Category:2003 songs Category:2003 singles Category:Queensrÿche songs Category:Songs written by Chris DeGarmo Category:Songs written by Geoff Tate Category:Songs written by Michael Wilton Category:American hard rock songs
title: Open (song)
